hero.title: AI-Powered Code Assistance for Neovim
hero.subtitle: Bring Cursor-like AI capabilities to your Neovim workflow. Open-source, extensible, and powerful.

ai_suggestions.title: AI-Powered Code Suggestions
ai_suggestions.description: Get intelligent code suggestions powered by multiple AI providers including Claude, OpenAI, and Gemini.

one_click.title: One-Click Application
one_click.description: Apply AI suggestions with a single keystroke. Review diffs and accept changes seamlessly.

multi_provider.title: Multi-Provider Support
multi_provider.description: Choose from Claude, OpenAI, Gemini, Cohere, and more. Switch providers based on your needs.

zen_mode.title: Avante Zen Mode
zen_mode.description: Focus on your code with distraction-free AI assistance. Perfect for deep work sessions.

acp.title: ACP Integration
acp.description: Agent Client Protocol support for advanced AI agent interactions and workflows.

project_instructions.title: Project Instructions
project_instructions.description: Define project-specific context with avante.md files for tailored AI assistance.

rag_service.title: RAG Service
rag_service.description: Leverage Retrieval-Augmented Generation for context-aware code suggestions.

custom_tools.title: Custom Tools & MCP
custom_tools.description: Extend functionality with custom tools and Model Context Protocol integration.

installation.title: Quick Start
installation.subtitle: Get up and running in minutes

community.title: Join the Community
community.subtitle: Connect with other developers using avante.nvim
